verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus loves the little children, newline All the children of the world. newline Red and yellow, black and white, newline They are precious in His sight-- newline Jesus loves the little children of the world.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus died for all the children, newline All the children of the world. newline Red and yellow, black and white, newline All are precious in His sight-- newline Jesus died for all the children of the world.
